findings.title: The function swapAndLiquify() adds liquidity to tokens in wrong proportion
findings.description: The function swapAndLiquify() adds liquidity to tokens in a 1:3 proportion instead of 1:1, resulting in incorrect BNB amounts.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Out of Gas Exception in includeInReward() Function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the excluded addresses list is too long.

findings.title: _getCurrentSupply also uses the loop for evaluating total supply
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and may cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
